page.title: 03RELIGION IN STANWAY
page.content: Along Chapel Road is the {Evangelical church.}This church is just across the road from Stanway Surgery.The church isn't very big.It is a family church and was built in 1880.Where the Sunday School takes place was not added on until 1927.Steven Spurgeon, Eric Blowes and John Pitts are some of the people who preach at the church.Lots of activities go on at the church for {YOUNG AND OLD.}It's {Youth Fellowship} on Mondays and women's {Rendezvous }on Tuesday.On Wednesday it's the {Israeli {group}.On a Friday night it is { {discovery}and on a Saturday it's{11-15 {group.}There is an {evening service} every Sunday and of course the{morning {service}and {Sunday school.}This church is quite popular in Stanway.
